name: Nephro
description:
A Horror Puzzle Adventure
A young woman becomes desperate when her younger sister gets rejected from the donor list that could have saved her life. Unravel the tragedy as you venture deep into this house of horror.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

TAB- Inventory

E-Use Equiped Item

Disclaimer*;
This is a student project meant for educational purposes only. It is the culmination of 6 weeks or 36~ hours worth of work.
